ygData.subject: [eqbards] Haste Items
ygData.msgSnippet: Sort of a sidebar to our bard loot whines (kidding!  I whine about our loot priority too sometimes). On another Trak raid yesterday (gotta love patches the day
ygData.messageBody:
Sort of a sidebar to our bard loot whines (kidding! I whine about our loot
priority too sometimes).

On another Trak raid yesterday (gotta love patches the day AFTER you kill
him, everyone is camped out nearby with their poison gear), a froglok
croaking dirk drops. 10/18 small amount of ac, agi, cha and mr. And its
awarded to me. I need to ask our guild leader why me, but I guess he gives
priority to people who are always there (I have been to all of our 6? Trak
raids now), cause I cant imagine no one else there asked for it. (Though it
peircing so maybe he only considered rouges and bards eligible)

Anyhoo, now I suddenly feel my melee dam could become meaningful, so I think
I need to get meself a hast item. Is there really any other option than
buying a FBSS? I have about 8k now, so I am close to its going price...

Elfson Allegro 55<The Circle of Eternity> Veeshan
